content: brighten up your holidays with these easy to make christmas tree coasters perfect for your home or for gift giving easy to follow pattern with detailed instructions skill level advanced beginner > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog here 1 > the benefit of purchasing this pdf is > an easy to read printable and > ad-free version of the pattern materials needed * worsted weight yarn * crochet hook size g 4 00 mm * tapestry needle finished coaster is 4 5 across pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/crochet-christmas-coaster/
